column5: 2015 at home. he was born on october 23

column24: 11:00 am at the fields-mc. kinley funeral and cremation services newaygo chapel with pastor steve vander. west officiating. burial will take place in the oak grove cemetery. memorials are suggested to the hospice of michigan or the american cancer society. please share your memories of ray at www. fieldsmckinley. com.
